comments:
Just tried this with M6 and it still happens.

I just received my copy of Building Commercial-Quality Plugins (2nd ed) and went through the process of using the plug-in wizard to build a simple plug-in with a view.  Then I moved on to the packaging section and did the following:

o File->Export->Deployable plug-ins and fragments
o Select my plug-in that I just built
o Select archive file of C:\Dev\EclipseWorkspaces\PluginTest\FavPlugin.zip
o Under Options, selected to include source, package plug-ins as individual jars, and save as Ant script to: C:\Dev\EclipseWorkspaces\PluginTest\package-favorites.xml.

Then when I click Finish, I get 2 errors in the Error Log:
o Unhandled event loop exception in org.eclipse.ui
o NPE in org.eclipse.ui.

Here's the stack trace for the NPE:

Error
